scripts.build-vendor: npm run build-prime & npm build build-elements & npm run build-moofx & npm run build-mustache
scripts.build-demo: browserify -x prime -x prime-util/prime/options -x prime/emitter -x mout -x elements -x moofx -x js-logger dist/demo/app.js --debug | exorcist build/demo.js.map > build/demo.js
scripts.watch-lib: watchify -x mout -x prime -x prime-util/prime/options -x prime/emitter -x mout -x elements -x moofx -x js-logger --debug dist/demo/main.js -o 'exorcist build/demo.js.map > build/demo.js' -v
scripts.watch: npm run watch-lib & npm run watch-css
